ClassDecl.Name: GuiColorizedTextElement
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Defines a text element with separate color configuration for each character. </summary> </Document>

ClassDecl.Name: ICallback
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> An callback interface. Member functions will be called when colors or fonts of a <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::GuiColorizedTextElement@s:vl.presentation.elements.GuiColorizedTextElement" /></links> changed. </summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: ColorChanged
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Called when the color table of a <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::GuiColorizedTextElement@s:vl.presentation.elements.GuiColorizedTextElement" /></links> changed. </summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: FontChanged
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Called when the font configuration of a <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::GuiColorizedTextElement@s:vl.presentation.elements.GuiColorizedTextElement" /></links> changed. </summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetLines
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the internal <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::text::TextLines@s:vl.presentation.elements.text.TextLines" /></links> object that stores all characters and colors. </summary> <returns>The internal <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::text::TextLines@s:vl.presentation.elements.text.TextLines" /></links> object.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetCallback
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the binded callback object. </summary> <returns>The binded callback object.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetCallback
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Bind a callback object. </summary> <param name="value">The callback object to bind.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetColors
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the binded color table. Use <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::text::CharAtt::colorIndex@s:vl.presentation.elements.text.CharAtt" /></links> to use colors in this color table. </summary> <returns>The binded color table.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetColors
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Bind a color table. Use <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::text::CharAtt::colorIndex@s:vl.presentation.elements.text.CharAtt" /></links> to use colors in this color table. <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::GuiColorizedTextElement::ICallback::ColorChanged()@s:vl.presentation.elements.GuiColorizedTextElement" /></links> will be called. </summary> <param name="value">The color table to bind.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: ResetTextColorIndex
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Reset color of all characters </summary> <param name="index">Color index of all characters.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetFont
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the font configuration for all characters. </summary> <returns>The font configuration.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetFont
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the font configuration for all characters. <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::GuiColorizedTextElement::ICallback::FontChanged()@s:vl.presentation.elements.GuiColorizedTextElement" /></links> will be called. </summary> <param name="value">The font configuration.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetPasswordChar
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the password mode displaying character. </summary> <returns>The password mode displaying character. Returns L'\0' means the password mode is not activated.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetPasswordChar
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the password mode displaying character. </summary> <param name="value">The password mode displaying character. Set to L'\0' to deactivate the password mode.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetViewPosition
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the left-top position of the visible bounds of characters. </summary> <returns>The left-top position of the visible bounds of characters.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetViewPosition
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the left-top position of the visible bounds of characters. </summary> <param name="value">The left-top position of the visible bounds of characters.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetVisuallyEnabled
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the enabling state. </summary> <returns>Returns true if the element will be rendered as an enabled element.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetVisuallyEnabled
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the enabling state. </summary> <param name="value">True if the element will be rendered as an enabled element.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetFocused
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the focused state. </summary> <returns>Returns true if the element will be rendered as a focused element.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetFocused
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the focused state. </summary> <param name="value">True if the element will be rendered as a focused element.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetCaretBegin
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the begin position of the selection area. </summary> <returns>The begin position of the selection area.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetCaretBegin
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the begin position of the selection area. </summary> <param name="value">The begin position of the selection area.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetCaretEnd
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the end position of the selection area. </summary> <returns>The end position of the selection area.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetCaretEnd
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the end position of the selection area. </summary> <param name="value">The end position of the selection area.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetCaretVisible
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the caret visibility. </summary> <returns>Returns true if the caret will be rendered.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetCaretVisible
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the caret visibility. </summary> <param name="value">True if the caret will be rendered.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetCaretColor
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the color of the caret. </summary> <returns>The color of the caret.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetCaretColor
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the color of the caret. </summary> <param name="value">The color of the caret.</param> </Document>
